Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: @bpkdasbaum Each UTXO over 10 accrues a reward over time, when you send that UTXO and do not claim that reward for yourself it has to go *somewhere*, so in lieu of it "diapering" it goes to whomever mines the block the tx is in

Author: CryptoNinjaa#5350
Content: So yes 150k could come up if that dude does not claim it

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
